data.name: IT-Tage
data.description: Die IT-Tage 2019 finden vom 09. bis 12. Dezember 2019 zentral an der Messe Frankfurt statt. Die Teilnehmer erwartet ein breites Spektrum an aktuellen IT-Themen.

relatedRecords.name: Silicon Saxony Day
relatedRecords.description: The 15th Silicon Saxony Day takes place at the BallsportArena Dresden on May 27, 2020. The biggest high-tech event in Saxony offers unique insight into future technologies and business solutions covering hardware, software and connectivity topics. relatedRecords.name: Erlang Workshop
relatedRecords.description: Date of the Workshop Sunday, 18 August 2019. Workshop Objectives The Erlang Workshop aims to bring together the open source, academic, and industrial communities of Erlang, to discuss technologies and languages related to Erlang.
